resources.string: Enter String and bot reply will be displayed below
\nWe are a passionate Developer .Our team is short but we do what we love.

\nThis App is a Kind of Virtual Personal Assistant and it\'s name is Chatmundo. It support voice feature to do all it\'s task like sms,news, etc. It has a good Artificial Intellience and talk smartly.

Chatmundo has a number of functions: 
 1. General Search via Google 
 2. News Search 3. Weather Report 
 4. Scheduler 
 5. Reminder 
 6. Call and SMS 
 7. Grocery Price 
 8. Chat with Bot 

 These functionalities are real-time and based on dynamic data sets. All of the functionalities are provided an input of speech which is converted to text with the help of speech to text engine. The output at stage is given by the text to speech inbuilt android engine. Apart from this the app considers a login from the user to store the user relevant data on the Googleâ€™s Firebase Storage. For better readability and accessibility at night time, the user can switch to dark or light mode as required which would turn the UI of the app respectively.

1. For searching internet:
		 use this commands: search for , find,google.

 2. For news report :
		 use show news, todays news

 3. For message:
		 use: send sms,send message,write message.

 4. For email:
		 use: compose email to,send email to.

 5. For grocery price:
		 use: tell me price of <item_name>,show price of <item_name>

 6. For call command:
		 use: call to,make a call,dial to, connect to.

 7. For reminder:
		 use: set reminder,set appointment.

 8. For weather report:
		 use: show weather.

 9. For App launch:
		 use:open or show <app_name>
